nodes.text: This Unidentified Hailfire-class droid tank was the predecessor of the better known IG-227 Hailfire-class droid tank.
Both models were contributed to the Confederacy war effort during the Clone Wars by the InterGalactic Banking Clan. Some units were equipped with flak missiles and a blaster cannon.
Following the execution of the Separatist Council by Darth Sidious's new apprentice, Darth Vader, these units were de-activated.
